DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety of Miglitol in patients with Type2 Diabetes Mellitus treated with Biguanide.
DOC.brief_title: Open Trial of Miglitol in Type 2 Diabetic Patients Treated With Biguanide
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetic patients with Biguanide treatment Criteria for postprandial plasma glucose and HbA1c are met Type 1 diabetes Patients treated with other antidiabetic drugs or Insulin
